Aaron Rodgers : Yeah, I was not really recruited out of high school, ended up playing baseball my senior year and thought about doing baseball, thought about joining the military but I decided to go the junior college route, which not a lot of kids go to who actually have good grades. Um, I had pretty good grades in high school.( Audience laughs) But that was a great opportunity to advance my career."
